duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales by providing a genuine and unique customer experience
Initiate genuine conversations and engage with customers in a personalized way to make them feel welcome, heard, and valued
Support a selling environment in all areas of the sales floor by connecting with multiple customers and sharing product suggestions
Provide a frictionless customer experience by utilizing technology to transact in the moment, find sizes and colors, and place orders for items not available in-store
Build productive relationships with peers, ask for support when needed, and help others
Participate in the learning and sharing of product knowledge, current trends, and personal styling priorities to inspire the customer
Contribute to a positive team morale by participating in store initiatives and highlighting peers and leaders through the SPARKED journal
Provide insights related to the customer and employee experience and communicate feedback to Store Leadership
Understand the contribution to service and selling on every shift and impact the store’s business

Support the shipment process to gain awareness of product, including what’s new and what’s restock; contribute to the completion of omni order fulfillment processes while maintaining stock levels of the floor
Maintain visual and operational standards while keeping the focus on the customer; stay current on merchandising updates

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED or equivalent required
